resources.name: SuperNative
resources.description: Listening practice with clips from Japanese media.
resources.descriptionLong: SuperNative provides listening practice using short clips from Japanese TV shows, movies, and other media. You listen to clips and answer comprehension questions, building your ability to understand natural Japanese speech.
resources.priceDetails: Free tier available. Premium for unlimited access.
resources.notes: Great for exposure to natural Japanese speech.

resources.name: Delvin Language
resources.description: Listening comprehension with Japanese audio content.
resources.descriptionLong: Delvin Language offers listening comprehension exercises using various Japanese audio content. The platform helps develop your ability to understand spoken Japanese through structured practice.
resources.priceDetails: Free content available. Premium for full access.

resources.name: JapanesePod101 Audio Lessons
resources.description: Extensive audio lesson library for all levels.
resources.descriptionLong: JapanesePod101 offers thousands of audio lessons covering all aspects of Japanese. The lessons include dialogues, vocabulary, and grammar explanations with native speaker audio. Great for learning on the go.
resources.priceDetails: Some free content. Full access requires subscription.

resources.name: Pimsleur Japanese
resources.descriptionLong: Pimsleur is an audio-based language learning method that focuses on speaking and listening. The course uses spaced repetition and graduated interval recall to help you internalize Japanese through listening and responding.
resources.notes: Effective for developing listening and speaking skills.

resources.name: Shadowing: Let's Speak Japanese
resources.nameJa: シャドーイング 日本語を話そう
resources.descriptionLong: Shadowing: Let's Speak Japanese is a textbook series designed for shadowing practice. The books include audio tracks for repeating after native speakers, helping improve pronunciation, intonation, and listening comprehension simultaneously.
resources.notes: Excellent for improving pronunciation through shadowing.

resources.name: JLPT Listening Practice
resources.description: Practice materials for JLPT listening section.
resources.descriptionLong: Various resources provide JLPT-style listening practice questions. These materials help prepare for the listening section of the JLPT by familiarizing you with the question formats and difficulty levels.

resources.name: NHK World Radio Japan
resources.description: Japanese radio broadcasts for listening practice.
resources.descriptionLong: NHK World Radio Japan provides Japanese radio broadcasts covering news, culture, and various topics. Listening to radio content helps develop comprehension of natural Japanese speech patterns.
resources.notes: Native-level content. Good for advanced learners.

resources.name: Forvo Japanese
resources.descriptionLong: Forvo is a pronunciation dictionary with recordings from native speakers. Look up any Japanese word to hear how it's pronounced by real Japanese speakers. Essential for learning correct pronunciation.

resources.name: JapanesePod101 Audio Blog
resources.description: Free audio lessons and cultural content.
resources.descriptionLong: JapanesePod101's free audio blog provides lessons on vocabulary, grammar, and Japanese culture. The content is accessible to beginners and provides good listening practice.

resources.name: Speechling Japanese
resources.description: Speaking and listening practice with feedback.
resources.descriptionLong: Speechling provides speaking and listening practice with feedback from native speakers. Record yourself speaking Japanese and receive corrections on your pronunciation and intonation.
resources.priceDetails: Free tier with limited recordings. Premium for unlimited.
resources.notes: Get feedback on your pronunciation from native speakers.
